text: Saulos Klaus Chilima (12 February 1973 - 10 June 2024) was a Malawian economist, politician and was the vice president of the Republic of Malawi until his death. == Education == Chilima went on to the University of Malawi, Chancellor College, where he obtained degree in social sciences, a master's degree in Knowledge Management, and received his Ph.D. in Knowledge Management from the University of Bolton in the United Kingdom. == Personal life == Chilima was married to Mary (n√©e Chibambo) and they had two children. ==Death== On 10 June 2024, an Dornier 228 aircraft of the Malawi Defence Force carrying Chilima and nine others went missing in the Chikangawa Forest Reserve in the Northern Region. On 11 June 2024, it was confirmed that Chilima and all passengers in the plane were confirmed dead in the crash. == References == Category:1973 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Malawi Category:Aviation deaths
